name: Loading {VAL}
description: This weapon must be reloaded after every {VAL} uses.

name: Breach {VAL}
description: This weapon can be used to breach a weak wall or a door from {VAL} space(s) away.

name: Slime
description: This piece of equipment has been modified by a slime, altering the behaviour of slime abilities cast on it.

name: Encumbrance {VAL}
description: This piece of equipment is so large or heavy that it decreases the bearer's movement speed by {VAL} spaces.

name: Concealed
description: This piece of equipment can be concealed, and will not show up in metel detectors or other scanners. A full body-check could still reveal it though.

name: Geneva Suggestions
description: This piece of equipment breaks the Geneva conventions... You monster.

name: Loot
description: This piece of equipment needs to be looted from an enemy before you can equip it.
